mapper.insert: insert into source_goods (id, order_no, type, load_province, load_city, load_county, load_detail_address, unload_province, unload_city, unload_county, unload_detail_address, freight, subscribe_num, call_num, browse_num, has_img, release_date, is_top, complain_num, status, complain_time, created, modified, linkman, mobile, openid, flag, remark) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{order_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{load_province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{load_city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{load_county,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{load_detail_address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unload_province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unload_city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unload_county,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unload_detail_address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{freight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{subscribe_num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{call_num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{browse_num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{has_img,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{release_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{is_top,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{complain_num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{complain_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{linkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.select: select id, order_no, type, load_province, load_city, load_county, load_detail_address, unload_province, unload_city, unload_county, unload_detail_address, freight, subscribe_num, call_num, browse_num, has_img, release_date, is_top, complain_num, status, complain_time, created, modified, linkman, mobile, openid, flag, remark from source_goods where status=0
mapper.update: UPDATE source_goods SET status=1 WHERE id IN (${ids})

update source_goods
type = #{type}, load_province = #{load_province}, load_city = #{load_city}, load_county = #{load_county}, load_detail_address = #{load_detail_address}, unload_province = #{unload_province}, unload_city = #{unload_city}, unload_county = #{unload_county}, unload_detail_address = #{unload_detail_address}, freight = #{freight}, remark = #{remark}, subscribe_num = #{subscribe_num}, call_num = #{call_num}, has_img = #{has_img}, release_date = #{release_date}, is_top = #{is_top}, complain_num = #{complain_num}, complain_time = #{complain_time}, modified = #{modified}, linkman = #{linkman}, mobile = #{mobile}, openid = #{openid}, flag = #{flag},
update source_goods set status=1 where id=#{id}
